alert.note: Alert for Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 8:14AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gulf, northwestern Wakulla and central Liberty Counties through 900 AM EST/800 AM CST/... At 813 AM EST/713 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stonemill Creek, or 18 miles south of Blountstown, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orange, Telogia, Vilas, Hosford, Jensen Place, Central City, Red Hill, Clio, Estiffanulga, Kern, Wilma, Lewis, Lowry and Nixon Garden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
